node.name: Cloud Foundry Integration for Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
This listing installs support into Eclipse for VMware Cloud Foundry, the industry’s first open platform as a service. Run your Spring, Rails and Node.js applications. Deploy from your IDE or command line.

Introducing Cloud Foundry

Cloud Foundry is the open platform as a service project initiated by VMware. It can support multiple frameworks, multiple cloud providers, and multiple application services all on a cloud scale platform.

  • Developer Productivity — Build applications with your choice of high productivity frameworks and application services.
  • Open System — Choose your framework, choose your cloud, choose your application services.
  • Faster Delivery — Shorten the time it takes to take your application from concept, to code, to the cloud using an open platform as a service.
node.body:
This listing installs support into Eclipse for VMware Cloud Foundry, the industry’s first open platform as a service. Run your Spring, Rails and Node.js applications. Deploy from your IDE or command line.

Introducing Cloud Foundry

Cloud Foundry is the open platform as a service project initiated by VMware. It can support multiple frameworks, multiple cloud providers, and multiple application services all on a cloud scale platform.

  • Developer Productivity — Build applications with your choice of high productivity frameworks and application services.
  • Open System — Choose your framework, choose your cloud, choose your application services.
  • Faster Delivery — Shorten the time it takes to take your application from concept, to code, to the cloud using an open platform as a service.
node.companyname: SpringSource, a division of VMware, Inc.
